div.head: 3845. Robert Southey to [John Morrison], 25 May 1822
div.p:
MS: Keswick Museum and Art Gallery, 1996.5.265a. ALS; 1p.
Unpublished.
Note on correspondent: Identified by content, payment of the rent for Greta Hall.
Inclosed is a draft on Messrs Longman Hurst &c, for £17-10s/ being, with the two reserved annuities of ten pounds each, the amount of my half years rent, at this time due.

I am Sir
yours &c
Robert Southey.
